ICDS II (1993–2001)
Between 1993 and 2001, the World Bank supported ICDS activities in Madhya Pradesh 
and Bihar. Components of the programme were identical to those in ICDS I. ICDS II was 
found to be unsuccessful in improving the nutritional status of children in Madhya Pradesh 
and Bihar. In Madhya Pradesh, there was found to be a 0.62 ppt/year increase in severe
